scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_8_: * "Hot Chocolate" - Topped with home-made marshmallows in the shape of bunnies./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_11: * "Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT&* Mightier than a sword?&* Maybe equal at best./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_14: * "Bandage" - Heals 10 HP&* It has cartoon characters on it./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_17: * "Bouquet" - A bouquet of beautiful flowers in many colors./
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_18: * Perhaps it could be offered to someone./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_21: * "Ball of Junk" - A small ball of accumulated things in your pocket./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_25: * "Ball of Junk" - A small ball of accumulated things in your pocket./
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_26: * It smells like scratch'n'sniff marshmallow stickers./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_30: * "Halloween Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT&* Orange with black bats on it./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_33: * "Lucky Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT&* Covered in green clovers and rainbows./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_36: * "Egg" - Not too important^1, not too unimportant./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_39: * "Cards" - The Jack of Spades^1, and the Rules Card./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_42: * "Box of Heart Candy" - It's not yours^1. Will that stop you?/%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_45: * There is a small shard of something in your pocket./
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_49: * "Eraser" - Weapon 1 AT&* Pink^1, it bounces when thrown on the ground./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_52: * "Mechanical Pencil" - 1 AT&* It's tempting to click it repeatedly./%
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_55: * "Wristwatch" - Armor 1 DF&* Maybe an expensive antique.&* Stuck before half past noon./%
